text.title: 7 BEST RESTAURANTS YOU CANNOT MISS IN ROME
text.p: seven restaurants you cannot miss in
Rome
[Music]
as the saying goes When in Rome do as
the Romans however in order to truly do
as the Romans you must also eat like the
Romans and must not Miss Rome's culinary
Heritage and culture
number one trapezium
[Music]
a small street food chain with locations
throughout Rome
the concept of trapezino is based on the
combination of the well-known Triangle
tremezino sandwich and pizza dough with
triangle-shaped pocket closed on the
sides making it a half sandwich and a
half Pizza
[Music]
number two Asteria de fortunata if you
enjoy eating homemade pasta come here
this is the place for you
they are very well known for their
Carbonaro along with other types like
Cassio apepe pesto and tomatognochi
[Music]
number three bouncy
Roman style pizza ataglio
a variety of one-of-a-kind pizzas
created to excite and entice
the lineup changes frequently throughout
the day based on availability of locally
sourced ingredients
[Music]
number four tonarello
[Music]
incredible food very affordable and in a
great location
recommend for those who are vegetarian
as they have some great dishes to pick
from
[Music]
number five alantico benayo
sometimes when you see a long line at a
restaurant in Rome you question if it's
worth it when there is so much good food
all around you
well this sandwich shop is worth every
second
all Antico vinayo uses a clever mix of
Vino and Panino two of the most amazing
products and you must try their
signature sandwich the summer sandwich
which includes prosciado mozzarella
tomato and basil number six to size
an absolute must try When in Rome both
classic and pistachio flavors are
excellent two sizes offers two flavors
every month or you can choose the
classic and caramel to strawberry and
pistachio
number seven opio Cafe
this place has a phenomenal view of the
Coliseum and Forum from the front patio
opio Cafe can be a worthwhile place to
relax for a while after a long morning
or afternoon of sightseeing
sit have your drink and enjoy the view
[Music]
